description:
The protagonist of the series. He`s a private detective who can`t remember what transpired in the US six years prior to when the story begins. However as the events plays out he slowly remembers what happened and how it`s all connected by a strange eldritch horror.
He moved the United States when he was 18, where he ran a detective agency but at 20 he got involved the case that made him lose his memories of both the event and his late girlfriend. [spoiler="."]At that time he was the prime suspect[/spoiler] While he has great deductive skills he can often come across as being ignorant of himself.
name: Suzusaki Satoshi
